items.title: Bruschetta
items.description: Toasted bread topped with tomatoes, garlic, and fresh basil. Drizzled with olive oil and balsamic glaze.

items.title: Mozzarella Sticks
items.description: Golden fried mozzarella cheese sticks served with marinara sauce.

items.title: Spinach Artichoke Dip
items.description: Creamy blend of spinach, artichokes, and three cheeses served with tortilla chips.

items.title: Stuffed Mushrooms
items.description: Mushroom caps filled with herbed cream cheese and breadcrumbs, baked to perfection.

items.title: Classic Tomato Basil
items.description: Rich and creamy tomato soup with fresh basil, served with croutons.

items.title: New England Clam Chowder
items.description: Creamy soup loaded with tender clams, potatoes, and vegetables.

items.title: French Onion Soup
items.description: Caramelized onions in a rich beef broth, topped with melted Gruy√®re cheese and crouton.

items.title: Caesar Salad
items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Parmesan cheese, croutons, and our famous Caesar dressing.

items.title: Greek Salad
items.description: Fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese with olive oil dressing.

items.title: Cobb Salad
items.description: Chopped salad with grilled chicken, bacon, avocado, eggs, tomatoes, and blue cheese.

items.title: Caprese Salad
items.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil, drizzled with balsamic reduction.

items.title: Asian Chicken Salad
items.description: Mixed greens with grilled chicken, mandarin oranges, almonds, and sesame ginger dressing.

items.title: Classic Club Sandwich
items.description: Triple-decker with turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on toasted bread.

items.title: Philly Cheesesteak
items.description: Thinly sliced steak with melted provolone, grilled onions, and peppers on a hoagie roll.

items.title: Turkey Avocado BLT
items.description: Roasted turkey, avocado, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on multigrain bread.

items.title: Portobello Mushroom Burger
items.description: Grilled portobello cap with roasted red peppers, mozzarella, and pesto on a brioche bun.
